column5: hi all. I'm looking for some plastic or aluminum bezel material to mount a couple rocker switches.  Does anyone know where I could find this in plastic,  aluminum or even a small piece or carbon fiber?  Thanks
If there's a Metal Supermarket around you they'll have whatever you want in aluminum. Can't offer anything on the plastic though.
The local car stereo installer shop might have what you need. Unfortunately I have what you need but the drive back and forth will cost to much. lol
Yep, go to your local car audio installer and ask for some 1/8" ABS plastic. And I too have some but the 11,000 KM round trip ain't gonna happen.

When I did my switch plate u just got a piece of 1/8" aluminum from metal supermarkets cut to size. I then drilled it out, sanded the corners round and  smooth on a belt grinder then primed and painted it.
